PILANESBERG INTL (SUN CITY) | format = [[PDF]] | publisher = [[South African Civil Aviation Authority]] | date = Effective 8 July 2004}}</ref> [[DAFIF]]<ref name="WAD">[http://www.worldaerodata.com/wad.cgi?airport=FAPN Airport information for FAPN] from [[DAFIF]] (effective October 2006)</ref><ref name="GCM">{{GCM|NTY|source=DAFIF (effective October 2006)}}</ref> }} '''Pilanesberg International Airport''' {{Airport codes|NTY|FAPN}} is an [[airport]] serving [[Sun City, North West|Sun City]] in the [[North West Province (South Africa)|North West]] province of [[South Africa]]. It is located adjacent to the [[Pilanesberg Game Reserve]]. ==Facilities== The airport resides at an [[elevation]] of {{convert|3412|ft|0}} above [[mean sea level]]. It has one [[runway]] designated 05/23 with an [[asphalt]] surface measuring {{convert|2750|x|30|m|0}}.<ref name="AIP" /> ==Communication== The Communication Frequency for Pilanesberg International Airport is 118.40 MHz. Runway lights can be activated by making 3-7 clicks on 118.40 MHz.<ref>AVIMAP Frequency Chart September 2011, [http://www.avimap.co.za/AVIMAP/pdfs/frequency_chart_sep11_(p-r).pdf AVIMAP Frequency Chart] link retrieved 23 December 2011</ref> The control tower can be contacted on +27 (0)14 55 22154. ==Nearby airports== * [[Lanseria International Airport]] * [[Rustenburg Airfield]] ==See also== * [[Pilanesberg]] ==References== <references/> ==External links== * [http://www.acsa.co.za/home.asp?pid=494 Pilanesberg International Airport] at [[Airports Company South Africa]] * [http://africa.cwsurf.de/Pilanesberg.htm Private website about Pilanesberg International Airport] * {{SkyVector|FAPN}} * {{NWS-current|FAPN}} * {{ASN|NTY}} <!--Navigation box--><br /> {{Passenger airports of South Africa}} [[Category:Airports in South Africa]] [[Category:Transport in North West (South African province)]] [[Category:Buildings and structures in North West (South African province)]] {{SouthAfrica-airport-stub}}
